import React, { useState } from 'react' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { containerAnim, shadowAnim } from '../animations' const Login = ({cursorRef}) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [logReg, setLogReg] = useState(true) document.body.style.overflow = "hidden" const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(3223) } window.addEventListener('popstate', function(event) { }) const exitDetailHandler = (e) => { const element = e.target if(element.classList.contains("shadow")){ document.body.style.overflow = "auto" // navigate(`/${location}`) navigate(-1) } } const ccHandler = () => { cursorRef.current.backgroundColor = "white" } return (

setLogReg(true)}>Sign In setLogReg(false)} className={`e ${ !logReg && "active-btn"}`}> Sing Up

) } export default Login
